statements: SELECT * FROM market_sentiment_data
SELECT stock_symbol, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiment_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT id, stock_symbol, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT trade_strategy FROM market_sentiment_data WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL'
SELECT MAX(sentiment_score) AS highest_sentiment FROM market_sentiment_data
SELECT * FROM market_sentiment_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT stock_symbol, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM market_sentiment_data GROUP BY stock_symbol
SELECT * FROM market_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.8 ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT stock_symbol) AS unique_symbols, DATE(timestamp) AS date FROM market_sentiment_data GROUP BY DATE(timestamp)
SELECT AVG(sentiment_score) AS average_score, trade_strategy FROM market_sentiment_data GROUP BY trade_strategy ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT * FROM real_time_sentiment_data ORDER BY timestamp ASC
SELECT asset_name, sentiment_score FROM real_time_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5
SELECT timestamp, asset_name FROM real_time_sentiment_data WHERE asset_name = 'AAPL'
SELECT * FROM real_time_sentiment_data WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT strategy_name, description FROM trading_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC
SELECT timestamp, asset_name, sentiment_score FROM real_time_sentiment_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT asset_name, AVG(sentiment_score) AS avg_score FROM real_time_sentiment_data GROUP BY asset_name;
SELECT strategy_name, COUNT(strategy_id) AS strategy_count FROM trading_strategies GROUP BY strategy_name HAVING COUNT(strategy_id) > 1;
SELECT description FROM trading_strategies WHERE LENGTH(description) > 100;
SELECT asset_name, MAX(sentiment_score) AS max_score FROM real_time_sentiment_data GROUP BY asset_name;
SELECT * FROM market_sentiment_data
SELECT id, sentiment_score, timestamp FROM market_sentiment_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE asset_class = 'Stocks'
SELECT trade_id, asset_name, trade_type, trade_amount FROM trade_history WHERE trade_type = 'Sell' ORDER BY trade_amount DESC
SELECT timestamp, trade_id, asset_name, trade_amount FROM trade_history WHERE asset_name = 'Bitcoin'
SELECT * FROM market_sentiment_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE asset_class = 'Equity' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE CHAR_LENGTH(strategy_description) > 100;
SELECT asset_name, trade_type, trade_amount FROM trade_history WHERE trade_amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM market_sentiments;
SELECT stock_symbol, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT trade_id, stock_symbol, trade_type, trade_date FROM trade_history WHERE trade_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM trade_history WHERE trade_type = 'sell';
SELECT stock_symbol, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiments WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5 ORDER BY sentiment_score DESC;
SELECT trade_date, trade_type FROM trade_history WHERE stock_symbol = 'AAPL' ORDER BY trade_date DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM user_profiles WHERE balance > 1000;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_description FROM trading_strategies WHERE id = 2;
SELECT * FROM market_sentiment_data;
SELECT timestamp, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiment_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT id, timestamp FROM market_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM trading_strategies WHERE risk_level < 0.3;
SELECT asset_name, price FROM asset_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_sentiment_data;
SELECT id, timestamp, sentiment_score FROM market_sentiment_data WHERE sentiment_score > 0.5;
SELECT asset_name, price FROM asset_prices ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT strategy_id, strategy_name, risk_level FROM trading_strategies WHERE risk_level < 0.3 ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;
